actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill granting authority to the Secretary of the Army to renew the license of the Ira D. MacLachian Post No. 3, The American Legion, Sault Sainte Marie, Mich., to use a certain parcel of land in Saint Marys Falls Canal project.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to renew the license of the Ira D. MacLachlan Post Numbered 3, the American Legion, Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, to use a specified parcel of land in Saint Marys Falls Canal project.

titles.title: A bill granting authority to the Secretary of the Army to renew the license of the Ira D. MacLachian Post No. 3, The American Legion, Sault Sainte Marie, Mich., to use a certain parcel of land in Saint Marys Falls Canal project.
